descriptions.frontend: Building immersive and responsive user interfaces.
descriptions.backend: Robust server-side logic and API development.

about_me.title: Tech Journey
about_me.description: Fullstack developer focused on practical solutions. Won Nestro Challenge Hackathon 2023, built enterprise blockchain systems, and actively contribute to open source. I enjoy working with modern tech stacks and have experience in both startups and large companies.

links.stack: Check out my stack: turborepo-ton-trpc (‚≠ê Recognized by TON Blockchain team)

adaptability.title: Modern Tech Stack
adaptability.description: Next.js, NestJS, React, Node.js for fast and reliable apps. Experience with microservices, TypeScript, and various databases. Always picking the right tool for the job.

code_quality.title: Clean Code Practices
code_quality.description: Strong typing with TypeScript, automated testing (Jest, Playwright), clear documentation. CI/CD pipelines and code review culture advocate.

business_focus.title: Key Features I Build
business_focus.description: Real-time data processing, responsive UIs, API integrations, payment systems, auth flows, and performance optimization. Focus on security and scalability.

portfolio.title: My Projects
portfolio.subtitle: A showcase of my recent work and personal projects
portfolio.nda_disclaimer: Project details cannot be disclosed due to confidentiality agreement

project1.title: E-commerce Platform
project1.description: Scalable e-commerce platform with microservices architecture. Features real-time inventory management, Stripe payment integration, and advanced product filtering system.
project1.tags: Next.js, TypeScript, Microservices, Stripe, MongoDB, Redis, Docker

project2.title: TON Blockchain Explorer
project2.description: High-performance block explorer for TON network. Provides real-time transaction graph visualization, deep smart contract analysis, and network activity monitoring.
project2.tags: React, Node.js, Microservices, TON SDK, D3.js, WebSocket, PostgreSQL

project3.title: Task Management App
project3.description: Collaborative project management platform with real-time synchronization. Supports Kanban boards, team chats, and workflow automation via notification microservices.
project3.tags: React, Firebase, Microservices, Tailwind CSS, tRPC, WebSocket

project4.title: Enterprise CRM Platform
project4.description: Transformation of a monolith into a distributed system with microfrontends and microservices. Implemented AI module for predictive sales analytics and customer service automation.
project4.tags: React, TypeScript, Microservices, Microfrontends, Effector, Kubernetes, GitLab CI/CD

project5.title: Big Data Analysis Platform
project5.description: High-load system for processing and analyzing large volumes of user data. Architecture built on microservices for parallel data stream processing using tRPC for type-safe API.
project5.tags: Next.js, tRPC, Microservices, Prisma, TypeScript, ClickHouse, Redis

project6.title: Telegram Mini Apps Ecosystem
project6.description: Series of Telegram mini-apps with deep TON blockchain integration. Includes non-custodial crypto wallet, P2P exchange, and social mechanics implemented via microservices architecture.
project6.tags: React, Next.js, TON, Microservices, Telegram API, NestJS, Redis, PostgreSQL

project7.title: GearAI - AI Aggregator
project7.description: Unified API gateway and platform for accessing 40+ LLM models (GPT-4, Claude 3, Gemini). Microservices architecture ensures load balancing and fault tolerance when working with foreign providers.
project7.tags: Next.js, NestJS, Microservices, RabbitMQ, PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker, AI/ML

project9.title: Enterprise BDO System
project9.description: Corporate ERP system for managing distributed assets and business objects. Built on event-driven microservices architecture using RabbitMQ for message delivery guarantees.
project9.tags: Next.js, NestJS, Microservices, RabbitMQ, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Redis, Turborepo

project8.title: BTConnect Marketplace
project8.description: Decentralized marketplace for physical goods with crypto payments. Smart contracts on BNB Chain for escrow deals and microservices for product indexing and order management.
project8.tags: Next.js, NestJS, Microservices, RabbitMQ, BNB Chain, Smart Contracts, PostgreSQL

project10.title: Gorrila Crypto Wallet
project10.description: Multi-currency crypto wallet with built-in exchange and P2P platform. Microservices architecture ensures transaction security and high-speed balance updates via WebSocket.
project10.tags: Next.js, NestJS, Microservices, Blockchain, DeFi, PostgreSQL, Redis, WebSocket

project11.title: BestProject Real Estate
project11.description: SaaS platform for real estate agencies with multi-tenant architecture. Includes CRM, object management, document generation, and integration with advertising platforms via microservices.
project11.tags: Next.js, TypeScript, Microservices, SaaS, PostgreSQL, Multi-tenant, S3, Docker
